flawed_nl_solution:
Jean kept 60/3=<<60/3=20.0>>20.0 stuffies
That means she gave away 60-20.0=<<60-20.0=44.0>>44.0 stuffies
So Janet got 44.0/4=<<44.0/4=11.0>>11.0 stuffies

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40.0, not 44.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
